statements: DELETE FROM employee_retention_rates WHERE employee_id = 101;

DELETE FROM retention_rates WHERE ending_date < '2023-01-01';

DELETE FROM employee_groups WHERE group_id = 5 AND employee_id = 102
DELETE FROM retention_rates WHERE retention_rate < 0.7;
